name: MISSION_KI
description: ### Development Start the database and the backend server with docker: ```bash bash start.sh ``` The application will be available at http://localhost:8070.

scripts.db:migrate: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -w /app server composer db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate:status: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -w /app server composer db:migrate:status
scripts.db:migrate:rollback: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -w /app server composer db:migrate:rollback
scripts.db:seed: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec -w /app server bin/cake migrations seed
scripts.db:reset: bash stop.sh && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && bash start.sh
scripts.translations:extract:
docker exec -w /app mission-ki-php bin/cake i18n extract --marker-error && docker exec -w /app mission-ki-php msgmerge --update resources/locales/de/default.po resources/locales/default.pot && docker exec -w /app mission-ki-php msgmerge --update resources/locales/en/default.po resources/locales/default.pot && docker exec -w /app mission-ki-php bash scripts/find-missing-translations.sh && echo '
✓ Extraction complete!
New untranslated entries are in: resources/locales/NEW_TRANSLATIONS.txt
Translate them in de/default.po, then run: npm run translations:compile'
scripts.translations:compile: docker exec -w /app mission-ki-php msgfmt resources/locales/de/default.po -o resources/locales/de/default.mo && docker exec -w /app mission-ki-php msgfmt resources/locales/en/default.po -o resources/locales/en/default.mo && docker exec -w /app mission-ki-php bin/cake cache clear_all && echo '✓ Translations compiled and cache cleared!'
